params._amountOutMin: The minimum amount received after attempting to swap in the destination
params._bridge: address of the bridge on chain _destination,
params._deadline: The deadline for swapping in the destination AMM market. 0 if no * swap is intended.
params._destinationAmountOutMin: The minimum amount of tokens to receive after bridging
params._destinationDeadline: The time the transaction must be completed

initHop(uint256).notice: Initializes local variables for the Connext facet

userdoc.notice: Contract which provides bridging functionality through Hop Protocol
